diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AE$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $3$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
Point $E$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $CD$, and $DA$, forming the kite $ABCD$.
The lines $AE$, $BE$, $CE$, and $DE$ are the lines connecting the vertices of the kite to the point $E$ inside the kite.
